summary: AN ORDINANCE granting Burlington Northern Santa Fe a railway franchise and the right, privilege and authority to locate, lay down, construct, maintain and operate standard gauge railway tracks in, upon, along and across 20th Avenue West and West Armory Way for a term of thirty years from the date of expiration of the franchise granted by Ordinance 72632, as amended by Ordinance 98117, specifying conditions under which this franchise is granted, and providing for acceptance of the permit and conditions.
